description:
This is a market on who will be honoured Person of the Year by TIME magazine for the year 2021.

Person of the Year (called Man of the Year or Woman of the Year until 1999) is an annual issue of the United States news magazine and website 'Time' that features and profiles a person, a group, an idea, or an object that "for better or for worse... has done the most to influence the events of the year".

Time's Person of the Year 2021 is picked by the newspaper's editors and is scheduled to be announced on December 13, 2021.

The market will be settled using a good faith interpretation of the winner. 
If, for example, Joe Biden is honoured together with Kamala Harris, this market will resolve to "Joe Biden". If the group honoured is named "Doctors & Nurses" or "First responders & Essential workers", this market will resolve to "Healthcare workers". If "Epidemiologists" win, the market will resolve to "Other." 

If multiple categories win, e.g. WHO and Healthcare Workers, then the market will resolve equally among those outcomes. 

----------------------------

Those were the last 10 Persons of the Year:

2020 - Joe Biden, Kamala Harris
2019 - Greta Thunberg
2018 - The Guardians and the War on Truth
2017 - The Silence Breakers
2016 - Donald Trump
2015 - Angela Merkel
2014 - The Ebola Fighters
2013 - Pope Francis
2012 - President of the United States
2011 - The Protester

Read more about Person of the Year: https://time.com/poy

Take part in Time's poll "Who should be 2021 Person of the Year?": https://time.com/person-of-the-year-reader-poll-2021/

question: Who will be Time's 2021 Person of the Year?
